meta.title: Carousel
meta.description: The <b-carousel> component is a slideshow for cycling through a series of content, built with CSS 3D transforms. It works with a series of images, text, or custom markup.

components.description: The <b-carousel> component is a slideshow for cycling through a series of slide content
